title: Android 13 will block sideloaded apps from using accessibility features
content:
With the first beta now behind us, Android 13’s formal debut is only a few short months away. This week, one of Google’s coming security changes has been uncovered, as Android 13 is set to strip accessibility features from sideloaded applications.

more…

The post Android 13 will block sideloaded apps from using accessibility features appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Sideloaded apps on Android 13 will be blocked from using accessibility APIs on Android 13 as Google's latest security measure.
